turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good Morning! Can you order me a coffee for pickup at peets?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! what location and time?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The location off of CA-49.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! Okay, I can order here online, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Chocolate and Caramel Swirl Javiva

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large, no Whipped Cream

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OH! and can you have them add some soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, I can do that. Anything else you need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You know what, can you just add a Chicken Chorizo Flatbread.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: When will that be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It looks like it will be ready for pick up in 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds great, can you repeat what I ordered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Large, no whipped, soy milk Chocolate and Caramel Javiva and a Chicken Chorizo Flatbread.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect! Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No Problem! My pleasure, Ok, I've got your payment confirmation. The receipt should show up on your phone soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wonderful, I really appreciate your help!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course! Have a great day! Goodbye.
